Package model

Class SudokuAccount

java.lang.Object
model.SudokuAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SudokuAccount extends Object implements Serializable
Each user that logs in to Slaydoku gets an account created. This account keeps track of the username, the number of games played, and the best time they had for a won game
Author:
Josh Samadder, Jenny Yu, Ricky Su, Chang Chia En

    • setBestTime

      public void setBestTime(int[] time)
      Compares the hours, minutes, and seconds of the current time and the best time to see which time is faster. If the current time is better than the previous best time, then the best time is set to be the current time
      Parameters:
      time - - An array that is expected to have the time in the format of [hours, minutes, seconds].

    • getBestTime

      public int[] getBestTime()
      Retrieves the user's best time
      Returns:
      bestTime - The user's best time in completing a Slaydoku game
